summary: Website for students to manage daily study and exercises.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly study-and-fitness mascot illustration, flat style, warm colors (student-mascot.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal app logo mark combining a book and dumbbell icon, flat monochrome (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Simple favicon version of the logo mark (favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create an authenticated student workspace using Internet Identity so each student can securely access only their own study and exercise data.
Build the core UI for managing a student’s day: a dashboard showing today’s study and exercise lists, with forms to add/edit items and controls to mark items complete.
Add a calendar/history view to browse previous days’ logs and quickly copy (duplicate) a prior day’s unfinished items into today.
Add simple progress insights: show weekly completion summaries for study and exercise (e.g., completed vs total items) and a basic streak indicator.
Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the student daily planner UI (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across all pages.
Add generated static image assets to the frontend and render them in the UI (e.g., in the app header/landing area) from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a student-focused website to handle daily study and exercise tracking/management.
Implement backend data models and persistence for daily logs that include study items and exercise items, each with status tracking and basic details.

projectName: Student daily study & exercise tracker website
